properties.areaDesc: Huron Islands to Marquette MI; Munising to Grand Marais MI; Eagle River to Manitou Island MI; Marquette to Munising MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 3:45PM EST until January 10 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and waves 3 to 6 feet occurring. For the
Small Craft Advisory, west winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to
30 kt and waves 3 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Eagle River to Manitou Island MI, Huron Islands to
Marquette MI, Marquette to Munising MI and Munising to Grand
Marais MI.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 7 PM EST this evening. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 1 AM to 7 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY
